name: The Return of the Living Arm
name_original: The Return of the Living Arm
description:
Mapped for an Xbox Controller - Some features are broken in browser, consider downloading the windows build.

A highly contagious infection turned the world into a Zombie playground. All life have left the earth leaving only living deads, walking on the streets.

The humain race just had the time to elaborate an AI to keep searching for a cure (even after the human extinction that eventually came).

You start the game as a zombie arm who has completely accepted is condition and fights to save his fellow zombies from this AI. Join with all the zombie parts you can find on your way to become stronger and fight AI robots who wants to transform you back into a human arm!

This game has been made in 48 hours during GMTK 2021 game jam. Have fun trying it :)

GMTK Game Jam link: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021

Credits:

NoytroO, Tyrko & Voprax - Game Development & Level Design

Yther - Graphic Design & Animation

Azaaroth - Music Composition & Sound FXs
